txt.en:
'This should suffice. We are not so defenceless ourselves.

'But with the numbers along the road sufficiently reduced, we should manage on our own.

'Thank you, traveller, for your much needed assistance.'

'We find ourselves at a crossroads, quite literally. My companions and I were on our way to Iáphel when one of our own expressed concern over their waggon. Naturally, we set up camp here so we could address their concerns before moving forward.

'Our scouts tell of a menace of local fauna that could present trouble for our party.

'You look as though you are handy with steel. Could you perhaps do us a courtesy and clear a path for us?'
Luingil has asked you to clear the road north of Neekerbreekers and lynx.
You have cleared a path on the central road to Iáphel in Pinnath Gelin.\n\nYou should report your progress to Luingil in Echad Lendir.
Talk to Luingil in Echad Lendir
Luingil is concerned about the fauna that presents a natural
